edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.otBatch.otExtension

Class OTExtensionCorrelatedSInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.otBatch.otExtension.OTExtensionCorrelatedSInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OTBatchSInput

    public class OTExtensionCorrelatedSInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements OTBatchSInput
    A concrete class for OT extension input for the sender.

    In the correlated OT extension scenario the sender inputs a delta array and gets as an input x0, x1 such that x0 = x1^delta.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)
